tips.title: Windows Update Stuck at 0%
tips.problem: Windows update is stuck at 0% and won't progress
tips.chatgpt_answer: Try these steps: 1. Restart your computer and try updating again. 2. Run Windows Update Troubleshooter from Settings > Update & Security > Troubleshoot. 3. Temporarily disable antivirus software during the update. 4. Use the Windows Update Reset script if needed.

tips.title: Printer Not Responding
tips.problem: Network printer shows as offline or won't print
tips.chatgpt_answer: Common solutions: 1. Check printer power and connections. 2. Restart print spooler service (services.msc > Print Spooler > Restart). 3. Clear print queue. 4. Reinstall printer drivers. 5. Check network connectivity and firewall settings.

tips.title: Outlook Not Sending Emails
tips.problem: Outlook can receive emails but won't send them
tips.chatgpt_answer: Troubleshooting steps: 1. Check SMTP server settings in account configuration. 2. Verify outgoing mail server requires authentication. 3. Check antivirus/firewall blocking port 587/465. 4. Test with webmail interface. 5. Repair Outlook installation if needed.
